TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataSourceCacheDurationConverter extends System.ComponentModel.Int32Converter

summary.span: 提供能将 32 位带符号整数对象与数据源控件缓存持续时间表示形式相互转换的类型转换器。

span.span: Provides a type converter to convert 32-bit signed integer objects to and from data source control cache duration representations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支持缓存的 ASP.NET 数据源控件通常提供一个 `CacheDuration` 属性，该属性可设置为控件缓存数据的秒数。ASP.NET data source controls that support caching typically provide a `CacheDuration` property that you can set to the number of seconds that the control caches data. 值0表示这些缓存上下文中的 "无限"， 类负责执行此显式转换。The value 0 represents "Infinite" in these caching contexts, and the class takes care of this explicit conversion. 页面开发人员不使用 类。Page developers do not use the class. 用于开发支持缓存的数据源控件的控件开发人员使用此类型转换器和 属性来修饰一个属性，该属性表示自定义数据源控件的缓存持续时间设置。Control developers who are developing data source controls that support caching use this type converter along with the attribute to decorate a property that represents a cache duration setting of a custom data source control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用特性来修饰支持缓存的数据源控件的属性 。The following code example demonstrates how you can decorate a property on a data source control that supports caching with a attribute. 在此示例中，数据源控件支持缓存语义并公开在其他 ASP.NET 数据源控件后建模的三个属性： `EnableCaching` 、 `CacheDuration` 和 `CacheExpirationPolicy` 。In this example, the data source control supports caching semantics and exposes three properties modeled after other ASP.NET data source controls: `EnableCaching`, `CacheDuration`, and `CacheExpirationPolicy`. `CacheDuration`属性使用 类型转换器。The `CacheDuration` property uses the type converter. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter/CS/somedatasourcecdc.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter/VB/somedatasourcecdc.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将 字符串或字符串 "无限大" 转换为值0。The method converts an string or the string "Infinite" to the value 0. 其他值由基类处理 。Other values are handled by the base class, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类始终返回 `false` ，以指示 从方法返回的集合 不是可能值的穷举列表。The class always returns `false` to indicate that the collection returned from the method is not an exhaustive list of possible values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象始终返回 `true` 以指示 应调用方法来查找转换器支持的一组公共值。The object always returns `true` to indicate that the method should be called to find a common set of values the converter supports.
